mdRecord.dcterms:title: Doepner, Herman J. to Willis D. Smith; 05 of 12
mdRecord.dcterms:description: 3. Doepner/Faulds--LettersItems 45-49Doepner, Herman J. to Willis D. Smith regarding the forms that Smith sent from his "National Protective Registry." Enclosed: Pocket identification cards, news flyer, large identification cards for finger and footprints, Smith's typed notecard reply, and envelope.; 10 leaves; DF 772
mdRecord.dcterms:subject: Identification
